mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Review (designBoardId, body, memberId) VALUES (#{designBoardId}, #{body}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.designBoardId, r.body, r.inserted IF (m.id = #{memberId}, 1, 0) own FROM Review r JOIN Member m ON r.memberId = m.id WHERE r.designBoardId = #{designBoardId} ORDER BY r.id
SELECT id, designBoardId, body, memberId, inserted FROM Reply WHERE id = #{id}
